titleStmt.title: An account of Robert Crosfeild's proceedings in the House of Lords, the last session, and this session of Parliament wherein will appear the present miserable state and condition of the nation, by the open violating and invading of the law and liberty of the subject : humbly presented to the consideration of the Lords and Commons in Parliament assembled.
titleStmt.author: Crosfeild, Robert.

notesStmt.note: Charging corruption in the government and the military.
Dated and signed at end: February 18th 1695/6, Robert Crosfeild.
Place and date of publication from Wing.
This item appears at reel 2:27 as Wing A219 (number cancelled in Wing 2nd ed.) and at reel 63:8 as Wing (2nd ed.) C7240.
Reproduction of originals in Huntington Library and Yale University Library.
